Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Dear Miss Meka,'}
{3: "When you see this letter, I'm already on my way to WGAA."}
{3: 'Finally, I have found my path, one that may separate me from a lot of things.'}
{3: 'Sorry about the decision I made.'}
{3: "But I didn't want to become a Construct out of impulse..."}
{3: 'I have always been painting with vivid, brilliant colors. Many people loved my work, and I was delighted.'}
{3: "I couldn't understand why Selena wanted to become a Construct. But..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1002.jpg'}
{3: "I have seen things you wouldn't believe. I watched pink beams fired from plasma cannons glitter in the eternal sky outside portholes."}
{3: 'Dark red missiles exploded next to shuttles that just left the space anchor.'}
{3: "The fighter aircraft's armor melted like Selena's pudding with bubbles and red-hot light."}
{3: 'I have finally found my path.'}
{3: 'What I used to paint... wasn\'t the "reality".'}
{3: 'Those works are like genetically engineered flowers that grow in a cleanroom. Once the cover is taken away, they wither and die.'}
{3: 'Compared with the eternal reality, those things I once enjoyed portraying look so meaningless.'}
{3: 'I finally understand...'}
{3: 'I need the power because I have come to realize how cruel the world is.'}
{3: 'An ordinary person is far too fragile against the Punishing Virus, let alone discovering the truth.'}
{3: "It's time to create... real work."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'From a personal terminal left behind in a dark studio, a message is being played again and again.'}
{3: '(White noise)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory110.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "...SOS signal sent... But it seems miracles won't happen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Not sure if anyone can receive my message...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "They're coming!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Hurry! Get in position!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "There's no time to waste...!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Listen, Ayla.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Our paths will be rectified, as long as we portray the world as it truly is.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "They're here!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'There are sounds of metals being cut and heavy objects dropping to the ground.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1007.jpg'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'As the world truly is...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Come, show me what "reality" is.'}
{3: 'A coolant pipe is cut open somewhere. Gray liquid keep dripping from above.'}
{3: "Only to make a hissing sound when it reaches the blazing blade of Ayla's scythe."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena, I can feel you. Your decisions, your feelings.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'You were able to recreate the last act of "Tempest" because you had always been facing this cruel world.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "And I'm fighting now, just like you... And it feels as thought you're right here by my side."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So, wait for me...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I don't know how long it will take, but I promise I will find you again. We will stand together, side by side."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'We will be the best partners. Be it in art or on the battlefield...!'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Feel it!'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Feel this power that stemmed from creation! Not for attention, not for the audience. A power that only comes after witnessing the truth...!'}
